title: As Trump Considers Second Iran Attack, It Could Be Deadlier Than the First
summary_full: Within days of the U.S. strikes on Iran’s nuclear facilities last year, all sides agreed to a cease-fire. This time could be different.
summary_public: Within days of the U.S. strikes on Iran’s nuclear facilities last year, all sides agreed to a cease-fire. This time could be different.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Second Iran Attack, It Could Be Deadlier
